website_summaries.verdict: Built-in bumpers, easy set-up and take-down, and a 100 lb. weight limit make this portable bed convenient and easy to use.
pros: Comes with carrying bag and pump
Bumpers and sheet-tuck feature keep children from rolling out
cons: May arrive with plastic odor, but it fades over time

customer_reviews.title: ... with a pump with different size nozzles wich was nice, also a cute carrying bag for everything
customer_reviews.text: The product came with a pump with different size nozzles wich was nice, also a cute carrying bag for everything, it inflates two pieces very quickly with pump provided no strong odor. Liked that i could use my crib sheets for matress and liked the ample size. Purchased 3 different brands to compare for sizing hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mattress stains sheets /color bleeds
customer_reviews.text: I noticed that the white sheet I had placed on the mattress was getting discolored after 2 nights of my son sleeping on it. After taking the sheet off and just running a dry washcloth over the mattress, the color is bleeding like crazy (pictured). Stained the sheets and the washcloths. The brown color did not come out in regular wash. I will have to bleach. Not sure what this is. But, if you're not using anything on top, your child will be laying right on this. We were away and had no alternative. Disappointed. Otherwise would have been all great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blake

customer_reviews.title: 👍🏼👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: Inflating took seconds. Size of actual crib. A little concerned about weight for traveling on plane. Overall- does its job!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great until it gets a hole.
customer_reviews.text: Updated 8/27/18: Contacted the company and they have wonderful customer service. Wanted to love this and did the first two times we used it. By the third time the outer ring had popped so we chased a rolly toddler around the floor all night. We only used this in hotels, it wasn’t jumped on and only plush toys were allowed near it. So loved it while it worked, daughter slept great on it but after two uses it had hole (which we haven’t located to patch yet).
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A. Cuny

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this travel bed for my little guy. We camp a lot and we tried the toddlers cot and he was afraid he was going to fall out of it, so he didn't sleep well. Got this for hunting season and it was awesome! He slept peacefully and it was noiseless. I didn't hear him moving around at all. Definitely worth the price. I also ended up using a battery powered air pump and it worked ok, but not like the one that comes with the portable bed. The tips were either too big or too small, but we got it aired up enough.
customer_reviews.author: SHays

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could give it 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: I cannot day enough good things about this bed. My toddler LOVES it and it has made traveling so much easier for us. I used to dread traveling because my child never slept well on pullout couches and if we had her in bed with us, we were sure to sleep with a foot on our head or in our stomach. She loves this bed, thinks it is fun to sleep in and it blow up and deflates so easily with the electric pump that comes with it. We have a 3 year old who is tall for her age and this will easily fit her for at least two more years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Bed!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2.5 year old who has quickly outgrown her pack & play. This is now her travel bed and she LOVES it. It is easy to inflate with the included pump and it is just as easy to deflate and store. The inflatable security rails are what sold me on this product and they do not disappoint. They are just big enough to keep my daughter from rolling out of bed but not so big that they look ridiculous. The material seems to be thick enough to stand the test of time as we have only had the bed for 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Groucho Jones

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality! Mine sprung a leak after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing that after just 4 months this inflatable bed is now deflating. It has sprung a leak and I’ve done everything to patch it, but it’s so poorly made that it’s impossible to find where the leak is. What a shame. It had so much potential and now it goes straight into the landfill. Don’t waste your money on cheap inflatables. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: Showgram

customer_reviews.title: A game changer for traveling with a toddler
customer_reviews.text: We have been so pleased with this bed. We bought it for a 2-month camping trip with our two-year-old, and we have continued to use it for travel or when we have company and she has to give up her bed. A standard crib mattress fits it perfectly. The sides have prevented her from rolling off (for the most part). Putting a blanket between the top mattress and the sheet seems to help with comfort and warmth.
customer_reviews.author: PlumPerch

customer_reviews.title: The mattress has a great concept however it cheaply made and it's only been ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in March of 2014. Our grandchildren live out of town and this is only used when they visit. The mattress has a great concept however it cheaply made and it's only been used about a dozen times. It is stored in a closet in it the carrying pack that it comes with. The seams have cracked and the outer part of the mattress will no longer stay inflated. Knowing what I know now I would have never spent 70.00 on this product. Sorry for the bad review, honestly I've never posted a one star review, it really is a very poorly made item.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly K Ward

customer_reviews.title: Great bed
customer_reviews.text: I had the toddler size bed before and it worked well, but somehow sprung a leak while on vacation. I couldn’t find the source of the leak so replaced it with this larger one. That was in October and so far I haven’t had any issues with this one. My grandson sleeps well and it says the weight limit is 150, but I think it could probably hold about 190. Only issue for me is the small carrying bag. How they ever got in there, I don’t know, but I can’t get it folded that small. I’m using a sleeping bag cover instead. With the great warranty, I think we will get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It’s great and then quickly not great
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bed in December but didn’t start using it until a month ago. There are seams along the mattress I would guess give it some rigidity. One of the middle seams separated from the bottom running about halfway up creating a huge bubble in the mattress. It wasn’t over inflated as I was nervous about that in the first place which may not even be something to worry about. Whatever the case pretty disappointed that this lasted a month.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan D.

customer_reviews.title: First one Popped
customer_reviews.text: Our original bed popped after about a month of use. The product is said to have a lifetime guarantee. We contacted the company for a replacement and never heard back. Fortunately, we were still within the replacement policy for Amazon and we got it replaced through Amazon. So far the replacement has been fine. it's a nice bed, but expensive. If they don't last, better to get the $20 generic version.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Holds air better than any other air mattress I have ever slept on.
customer_reviews.text: We used this toddler bed to help transition my daughter from the crib to a single bed. We were able to have her sleep on the mattress with the crib still in the room until she was no longer interested in the crib then we switched the crib for her big girl bed and kept the air mattress in the room until she was comfortable sleeping in her bed. The mattress was in her room for over a month through the whole process and never needed to be refilled with air. It held the air extremely well while withstanding a great deal of abuse from an energetic toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Millette

customer_reviews.title: Deflated in one night with no one sleeping on it
customer_reviews.text: We blew this up to test it out before a road trip and when I checked on it the following morning I thought my husband had released the air out of it. That's how deflated it was the following morning. He tried to locate a leak, and used the patch that came with it once he thought he found one. Still didn't hold air, so we returned it. We wound up buying a $10 lightning deal kids mattress and that one held air in it for a week!
customer_reviews.author: Lulumom

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler bed and a perfect size for the little ones
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bed for toddlers. Our eight year old even fits on it. It takes crib size sheets so that is a plus also. Blows up real fast and deflates nicely. It comes in a really great bag and the bag is bigger than the product so we were able to put the sheets and waterproof cover right in the bag for traveling. I am really glad someone came out with a smaller air bed for kids. The sides are nice also. Keeps kids in the bed while sleeping. No more worries about them falling out.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase for Travel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress for a family trip out of the country. We ended up not needing it when we got there, but boy have we gotten some use from this thing since! My daughter looks for any and every excuse to sleep on her "tiny bed" whether we are at home or if she sleeps over at her grandparents' houses. It is very easy to inflate and deflate, and standard toddler sheets fit it. We also use crib fitted sheets, and while they're a bit tight they do work fine. Definitely would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: luckyduckypuddinpop

customer_reviews.title: My 3 year old grandson loved the bed- he said it was comfortable and claimed it right away.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson and his family came to visit. I did not have a toddler bed. I purchased the Toddler Travel Bed for this reason. Found it easy to inflate and deflate. It did not have a plastic stick to it. It is sturdy. And a great size and fit. My grandson loved the bed. He slept well and even played on it. He laid claim to it he liked it so much! Reviewed a number of toddler beds before this purchase. This one looked sturdy, comfortable and safe! Great purchase for our family!
customer_reviews.author: kgic

customer_reviews.title: Shrunks Inflatable bed is comfy and inflates with ease.
customer_reviews.text: The shrunks toddler travel bed portable, is the perfect size for our toddlers and school-age kids. It has an outer ring for inflation and an inner ring for inflation. It inflates and deflates with ease. It is very comfortable, easy to put a fitted sheet over, and stores nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Janina C

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable and convenient!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this bed for almost 1.5 for at least 1 week per month as we travel for my work. My son sleeps great in it and he is now 4 and still fits well. It inflates easily and quickly. It’s sturdy enough that I’ve laid on it with my son and I am 6ft 200lbs, though I am sure that isn’t recommended. It fits in our suitcase (takes up half of 1 side in a small suitcase). I wanted to write this review almost a year and a half later because it really is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for toddler on week long trip
customer_reviews.text: Good size for toddler (size of a toddler bed) and we were able to use her toddler/crib sheet on it instead of buying a special sheet. It inflates and deflates very quickly. Only issue is when inflating, you're supposed to pull forward a flap inside the air hole, which is awkward to do (but doable). Took this on a week long trip and worked well (didn't have to re-inflate). Comes with a bag with a tie to store it in.
customer_reviews.author: JJM

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed years ago for our first child and loved it! Now 7 years later we just pulled it out for a trip with our youngest. It's a little stained, but no odor, inflates easily, comfy.... and he slept through the night. What more could I want!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great company!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is perfect for our visiting grandchildren. Easy to set up and travel with. Even though a leak developed in one of the seams I was so impressed and happy that this company stood behind their product and sent us a replacement. They went above and beyond to make sure that we had the replacement in time for the holidays. I highly recommend this toddler bed. The pump works great for inflating the mattress along with all of the pool toys!
customer_reviews.author: bebeyond858

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, easy addition to travel gear for pre-schooler
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 year old slept so soundly in this bed from the very first night onward (which is unusual for him!). He was pretty excited that this was a bed "just for big boy me!". We use it at Gramma's house for weekend trips and when we travel although he asks for it at home now too--must be cozy! Folds up into a nice manageable size and blows up in about 30 seconds. He has plenty of room on this twin size mattress so I'm hoping we can use it for travel for many years to come. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: EVSHK

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our almost-4-year-old to sleep on for a few months while our stuff is in storage. It is the PERFECT size for her height (she's a little tall for her age), and for her Peppa Pig toddler bedding. My favorite part is that there's a mattress part and almost a railing part, which are connected but inflate separately. This ensures her bedding stays tucked in all night - no sheets popping off corners! Truly one of our favorite Amazon purchases! (In the apartment pic, the mattress fits behind the sofa with room to spare.)
customer_reviews.author: Brandon W

customer_reviews.title: The air pump was broken.
customer_reviews.text: I love the toddler bed and it's actually quite comfortable. It is easy to fold up and small enough to fit into a suitcase. The portable air pump was broken upon arrival but easily replaced with a cheap one from our local store. I would definitely recommend this for travel. Even my 10 year old niece slept on it.
customer_reviews.author: Youaremysunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great travel bed for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this travel bed after my daughter grew too big for her pack n play which she used to sleep in on trips. We live in different states than our family so when we visit we stay at the house in the guest room. We used this during our most recent trip and my daughter slept better on this than she ever did in her pack n play. It was easy to pack, unpack, and inflate!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: Must have for any household, you get your money's worth!
customer_reviews.text: We've had ours for years and haven't had a pop or anything. Blows up nice and is a toddler size. Fairly comfortable. As a Mom, I have had to cuddle up on it for a little bit and my weight didn't hurt it. Folds up nice in a bag for easy storage. Perfect to take camping, to grandmas, or any family's for overnight. We've even used it in the hotel room so we didn't need to get an additional bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Strange

customer_reviews.title: Test it before you take the trouble of taking it in the road
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter for a family Christmas get together. First night was great she slept all night. 2nd morning she was on the floor. The inside mattress would not hold the air. It is a great idea but useless if it does not hold the air. I recommend inflating it before you take it on the road. Let them sleep on it a night or two. They are sending replacement and I hope it works
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: This was so great for our military move and our two year old ...
customer_reviews.text: This was so great for our military move and our two year old daughter transitioning out of her crib. We were in transit for about 4 months and she made this her bed. We were able to visit family and travel with it. I love the pump, it takes less than a minute to blow it up and deflate it and then can be tucked away in a small suitcase for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Gunderman

customer_reviews.title: My wife and I love then, and our kids love them too
customer_reviews.text: We have had our Shrunks beds for over two years now. My wife and I love then, and our kids love them too. The design is great because it keeps the kids on the mattress and off the ground. We use them every time we go away for a night or more to a friend or relatives house or when we go camping. We had a minor issue with our Shrunks bed recently and I am extremely happy with the quality of the customer service we received. I love a company that stands behind their product and takes good care of their patrons.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Two mattresses and two holes
customer_reviews.text: We love(d) this bed and we're so disappointed. We bought one back in 2017 and it got a hole relatively quickly. We couldn't find it but every time my daughter slept on it, she'd end up on the floor. Since we couldn't find it, we couldn't patch it. We still liked it so we bought it again. ANOTHER hole. We found it this time and the patch didn't work. We use it in our bedroom when she comes in scared at night and we have to blow it up again every night because the hole won't stay patched. I wanted to love this but I am so bummed because it is not cheap!
customer_reviews.author: LMac

customer_reviews.title: These things are AWESOME! We have 2 year old twins and were ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are AWESOME! We have 2 year old twins and were trying to figure out how we were going to travel with 2 pack and plays. We bought these, set them up in their room so they could get used to them before our trip and they love them! The first night, not so much but after adjusting to it, they were asleep in no time. We are happy to be able to pack a few less items!
customer_reviews.author: L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little Bed to serve a travel - temporary purpose.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that I had a problem with was the little black flap INSIDE the plastic bubble where nozzle went. I didn't understand "how" to close it so air wouldn't escape. Directions could explain that a little better. The hubz came to the rescue tho - he knew what to do. Other than that - fantastic little bed for the price!
customer_reviews.author: NELLEHEART

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, portable travel bed for our toddler on-the-go!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing travel air bed for our toddler! Our almost 3-yr-old has almost outgrown his toddler bed at home, but this toddler travel bed will fit him for several years. Happy he will still be able to use his favorite crib bedding with this smartly designed mattress, since its inset air chamber fits toddler sheets! He loves having his "special bed" with the comfort of his home bedding when we travel to the grandparents', hotels, etc. We love The Shrunks company and their inflatable bed rails as well! So quick to set up, break down and the products all actually fit in their travel bags after first use.
customer_reviews.author: N. H. 12

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great solution for travel, having little friends over. We have 2 beds at each grandmas homes. One of the 4 came with a bad pump. I initially got annoyed because they made me write an email with pictures and all that. But they sent a replacement in no time. I’m very happy with both product and customer care. My kids love them too because they sleep thru the night. Assembly takes about 30 sec. putting them away maybe a whole minute? And no need to use the pump for that. Air comes out very easily as it folds.
customer_reviews.author: JMF

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing! We got the first one as a gift 6 years ago and have used it probably 100 times. I just ordered a second one because the first one got a hole in it (I have no idea how-maybe the 3 boys jumping on it all the time!) Anyway, the second is just as awesome! We use it for sleepovers in our bonus room , hotel room, and at relatives homes. It is the perfect size. We have used it for a 14 month old all the way up to a 7 year old! Can't say enough good things about it!
customer_reviews.author: JRP

customer_reviews.title: Inflates in less than 30 seconds--kids love to help
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this portable bed for a couple of years now. We haven't had an issue with it yet. Recently bought a second one for our younger child. We put a mattress pad and a crib sheet over the inside part to keep it clean. Fits a standard size crib sheet. Inflates in less than 30 seconds--kids love to help. Comes with carrying bag and pump. Both are a convenient size--easy to fit in any suitcase or bag. Great if you don't have much storage space. We've tried a folding travel cot and find this to be much better.
customer_reviews.author: redbuttons

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for visiting grandson who will no longer use pack n play
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to inflate and deflate. Stores in a small bag and easy to transport for traveling. Uses crib sheets. My grandson has slept on it once with no issues. Love the sides on it to keep him safe.
customer_reviews.author: threejtwop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We thought this bed would be perfect for times when our granddaughter visited us. It was so perfect that her parents soon asked if they could carry it with them on car trips to other places! (They do bring it back for visits to our house, too.) Now we have purchased a second bed for her little sister. I put a crib-sized mattress pad and fitted sheet on it.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Well worth a few extra bucks!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 3 1/2 year old. What a fantastic find! This is an ingenious design--we love that you can tuck in the sheets!! We had thought of purchasing a cot that was half the price, but so glad that we invested a bit more. You can see the quality is fantastic, and it has been very comfortable for our little guy. He has not fallen out of bed once. We bought this for a vacation, but also use it occasionally at the Grandparents'. It's very easy to inflate and deflate with the pump that comes with the purchase. Again, we are very impressed with the design!
customer_reviews.author: Johnandmo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bed for Toddlers
customer_reviews.text: These Shrunk toddler travel beds are wonderful! With the accompanying sleeping bag, they are a bit pricey, but well worth the money. I have five grandchildren and recently purchased my fourth travel bed with accompanying sleeping bag (additional price and different company). My grandsons (ages 3 to 5 years) love the beds and particularly like that the cousins can all sleep in the same room when at Nana's and Grandpa's!
customer_reviews.author: J. Hoar

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted a few months, then started leaking air on the seam.  Patch kit did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted a few months, then started leaking air on the seam. Patch kit did not work. Son wound up sleeping on hard floor by morning. Called customer service to inquire about a discount on a new one, but nothing. Too expensive to just last 12 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: momof6

customer_reviews.title: Great for Travel with a 3-1/2 yr old!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 3-1/2 yr old, on floor next to our bed when staying with relatives. She was very comfortable, didnt roll off & sheets stayed tucked. Easy to inflate with pump, but pump is loud enough that I suggest you inflate BEFORE quiet time if you can (or drop off one parent to inflate it at the hotel/room, while the other drives around to keep kids asleep until their bed is ready for easy transfer from car to bed:)
customer_reviews.author: spt88432

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: perfect size for my 3 year old. Can use with standard crib sheet. Not super loud when she moves around on it. Inflates quickly. Can get pretty firm. Comes with a travel case. Cons: hard to plug without air escaping (took a few tries). Bumpers could be a little higher. My daughter rolled off a few times.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great little travel bed!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a travel bed for my 2.5 yo & it's exactly what I was looking for! The plug in pump is awesome & it was completely inflated in about 30 seconds. My daughter loved it & it's a great size & fit for her. It deflated quickly & rolled back up into the carrying bag easily. Looking forward to using it a bunch.
customer_reviews.author: DanaMich26

customer_reviews.title: Air mattress won't hold air
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months of only occasional use by the grandkids, the inside mattress went flat and won't hold air. I'm not happy about this! And the window for replacement is closed, so I feel I've lost my money on this product. If the seller or The Shrunks read this, I'm available to discuss the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Hoglard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toddler travel bed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my almost three year old as a travel bed when he outgrew his pack n play. He is so excited having his own special bed and loves helping blow it up. We use extra twin sheets on it. He’s five now and still has plenty of room. In fact we just purchased a second for his younger brother! It comes with its own bag and doesn’t take up much space. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Worked well...just a bit big
customer_reviews.text: Just used this at our first away trip with our three year old. It worked great with a set of twin sheets tucked into the brown portion of the bed (I just tucked the extra fabric right on in to the sides). I would say that if you plan on using this in a hotel, make sure you have enough space. This is a TRUE twin size mattress. We were a bit tight in the hotel but we will just be sure to have a larger room on our next trip.
customer_reviews.author: Prie

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: WONDERFUL!!!! I researched many toddler travel beds and this is great!! My daughter loves it! It blows up so fast and has held up great we have used it for beach trip and other hotel stays and even at Grandparents just to have piece of mind she is safe with the bumpers. It works great with her regular crib sheets. She does say it is bumpy but she has slept great on it. The pump that comes with it is great and small we couldn't get it in the travel bag with the bed but I am sure that is because I cant roll it up small enough. Great investment that will be used for years hopefully.
customer_reviews.author: dsd23

customer_reviews.title: It STINKS, literally!
customer_reviews.text: The air mattress would be great for portability, easy to inflate, use and store. However, right out of the box it has a horrible plastic outgassing smell that is certainly toxic to breathe. I refused to let my grandchild sleep on it to breathe that in all night. Maybe if I had known ahead of time I could have put it outside in the yard for a week or two to let it dissipate. You would think a company that is making baby/toddler products would be conscientious to use safe, non-toxic materials. Very disappointed with product quality.
customer_reviews.author: JANA

customer_reviews.title: Great extra bed for toddler!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bed for our 2 year old granddaughter. She simply loved sleeping in it. After initially fumbling around a bit while blowing it up, it worked really well the second time around. Also holds the air really well!
customer_reviews.author: Ortrun Gates

customer_reviews.title: Durable and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this bed for just over 3 years now with zero issues. This blow up bed is convient for travel and keeps your tot from rolling out. I initially purchased it for my 4 year old for travel, however now my 18 month old has slept in it every night on our bedroom floor for about two months. (Transitioning from co-sleeping..don’t judge 😉) I put a crib sheet on ours, but you prob don’t absolutely have to. It has a soft surface where the child lays. It is well made and has been amazing for us.
customer_reviews.author: angela nichols

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a must have for travel. It is so compact and easy to inflate. You can use regular crib sheets. It is very durable and worth every penny. We have used it on multiple trips now and my tot slept like a rock every night.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Will never buy this brand again , second use and rip!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: We love this and have had it for a while and used it a lot for a month long trip. It fits the standard crib sheets perfectly and our 3 yr old loves it. Super easy to inflate and deflate when needed. I like it for traveling because we don't have to worry about him falling off tall hotel beds since he rolls a lot when he sleeps. Even if he were able to roll out of this (although he can't) he wouldn't be high off the ground at all and wouldn't get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Duryea

customer_reviews.title: Air leaks out
customer_reviews.text: After 4 uses, the outer ring doesn't hold air. We have only used it on a smooth surface and obviously have not had sharp objects around yet the outer ring leaks 75% of its air within 2 hours. It is now pretty useless. Really wish I could exchange it since there is a 2-year warranty, but I that has not been the case. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: JRidge28

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical but this had turned out to be a great purchase. Fits my 2yo perfectly & heMll be able to get at least 2 more years of use out of it. We used it on vaca and take it to the grandparents house. He will no longer sleep in pack n play but can’t yet sleep in regular bed, without falling out. Crib sheets & pee pads fit this perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jill S. Renner

customer_reviews.title: Small kids inflatable bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandkids when they come to visit...just uses a crib sheet...we have inflated it numerous times over the past year and it's seems to be built really well...I feel.kids up to about 6 or 7 could use it ...sides inflate higher to hold the kids from rolling off.
customer_reviews.author: janis johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Superb quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. I wish I had it for my older two! I had this sent directly to our hotel so we wouldn’t have to bring it there. That being said , it’s light and easy to travel with. Super easy and quick to use. My almost 4 year old loved it. I think age 1-5 could happily sleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Works for tall babies
customer_reviews.text: My 7 1/2 month old is so tall that he's already outgrown 12 month pants. Needless to say finding a travel bed to fit his length and keep him safe was a challenge. This bed is PERFECT! I feel comfortable knowing the he is and secure. I do put the head of the mattress up against a wall. Even if he did roll off of the bed (which he hasn't because of the siding) it would be a very short distance from the floor and he would be fine. This is great for tall babies that havw outgrown a packnplay and other travel beds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: was perfect for travel!
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure what we were going to do on a recent 10 day Hawaii vacation as my daughter had just transitioned out of her crib into a toddler bed. I know a popular option is to have children use guard rails on a second bed, but we did not have that ability in our room. My daughter loved her bed! She was excited at the second resort when we were blowing up the bed. The bed remained firm throughout both stays, and my daughter slept comfortably on the bed for naps and her standard 11/12 hours overnight. I am so thankful we ordered this and brought it with us in our checked luggage!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Moylan

customer_reviews.title: This air mattress is awesome. I love that standard crib sheets fit the ...
customer_reviews.text: This air mattress is awesome. I love that standard crib sheets fit the inner section. I used one of the padded crib sheets and a top fitted sheet to make it as comfortable as possible for my child and he loved it. It stayed inflated for the entire duration of two one-week vacations and never had to be re-inflated. the air blower that comes with it is a little weak, but since the mattress is smaller compared to standard sized air mattresses, I can kind of understand that. worked perfectly and i'll be buying another one for next years vacation (for my other child).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great portable bed. I got if for my 3 1/2 year old grandson, but even an adult could sleep in this very comfortably. The electric pump that comes with it blows up the bed very quickly - just a couple of minutes. I was worried that it wouldn't fit back into the carrying bag and it had been inflated, but the air came out very easily and I was able to get it back in the bag with not problem. It's a great alternative to an actual bed if you just need some occasional sleeping arrangements.
customer_reviews.author: C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Hold air we’ll then just popped a hole.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and my son loved it but it now leaks and no longer works. It’s unfortunate as we really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Granzin

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought The Shrunks Toddler Travel Bed Portable Inflatable Air Mattress Bed 60 x 37 x 9 inches and after the first or second use the outer inflatable section would be flat by morning. We used it maybe 3-4 times at most but was super frustrating after the outer layer wouldn't stay inflated. I bought this mattress (at a price premium) based on the fact that it came with a lifetime warranty but have yet to hear back from customer service. Also difficult to inflate. The hole is too big so when you remove the pump a ton of air comes out. No smaller blow up portals available to make sure it's firm when filled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Our toddler used this inflatable mattress for just a few nights before it started to deflate completely overnight. Very poor quality. Unfortunately we missed the return window so we can't even get a refund now. Don't buy this product, it's a waste of money. Amazon should not be carrying this awful and expensive product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect travel bed
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this for my toddler! Great for parents who want to travel without a huge suitcase. It IS heavy, but worth it! Also nice to have my son in the same room as me but not in my bed!
customer_reviews.author: Flying Post

customer_reviews.title: Shrunks customer service has shrunk
customer_reviews.text: Mattress Won’t inflate. Tried customer service but no answer. This is our third shrunks bed (and we bought the portable bed rails) and the customer service used to be really good (which is why we were repeat customers) but not anymore. So disappointed. Won’t buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: A C

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great for grandparents or sitter. Child feels secure and you have ease of mind.
customer_reviews.author: Tbird

customer_reviews.title: This product does not work as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I inflated the bed per the instructions and after watching the instructional video. The bed part and the mattress inflated just fine, but 30 minutes later the mattress was flat. I did this three different times with the same results. I have contacted the company by phone three different times with no response. I will not purchase anything from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Allen and Julia

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this travel bed a few months ago to accomodate my younger visitors and it has been a hit so far. The material looks durable and it is very easy to inflate/deflate with the included pumps, it has lasted several days of daily use without having to be reinflated.
customer_reviews.author: Inge

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Will buy again for my youngest when he grows out of his pack and play.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son when he sleeps over my mothers place. It was easy to blow up and he thought it was so fun that he wanted to be in it all the time. He slept through all 3 nights he was at my mothers and never got up complaining about the bed. The bed also stayed full without the need to pump it up again like many blow up mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling with toddlers!
customer_reviews.text: I now own two of these, for my 4 and 2 year old and they are awesome! We live about 700 miles away from our extended family and visit often(3-4 times a year for about a week at a time). My kids are tall so pack and plays were not an option much past age 2. Their toddler bed/crib sheets fit and they blow up in minutes. The bumps on the side keep them in the bed and it rolls up really nice and small. We shoved my 9 year old nephew in it once and he still fit in it so you can really get years out of it. Great product, I couldn't travel without them!
customer_reviews.author: Jen C

customer_reviews.title: So Easy & Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this bed. My daughter is in that in between age where she’s way too long for a pack and play but too little to put in a regular bed. This mattress took me about 30 seconds to figure out, and then 30 seconds to inflate the whole thing. It almost seems more comfortable than my toddler’s own crib mattress. This makes traveling for the holidays a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: toothfreak09

customer_reviews.title: Nice and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: - bought for a vacation and it held up great vs renting a bed. - light weight - held full air for about 2 days. Then started to lose a bit of its firmness. Blew it back up in 30 seconds to get it firm again. - glad I purchased for our toddler. She had fun playing on it
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Toddler focused. Co sleeping safe
customer_reviews.text: I got this during our out of state move. We needed a bed for in between furniture delivery. This is much quieter than other air mattresses. I love the side barriers, fits standard crib sheet. It also happens to support a parent cuddling a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Julie G

customer_reviews.title: My one daughter loves this bed, it is big ...
customer_reviews.text: My one daughter loves this bed, it is big enough for her to toss and turn without falling off. Since it is big, it does take up a bit of space which could be difficult depending on where you were putting it.
customer_reviews.author: Murphquin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We just ordered this to keep at our in-laws for our "almost 3 year old". It's wonderful. It takes 1 minute to inflate and is huge. You inflate the inner and outside area separately. We tuck sheets in it and she uses a blanket and pillow. It's gigantic for her, but she can wiggle around and spread out. She's slept amazing on it. I'll update if there's any punctures, but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: L. Boogie

customer_reviews.title: Child rolls off bed, will not hold air after little usage.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about 6 uses and then would not hold air. Also, my 3 year old was constantly rolling off the bad multiple times per night. The sides don’t have enough height to hold in a child. The air pump is good but that is the only redeeming quality.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas E

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to inflate and stayed fully inflated for days
customer_reviews.text: Used this bed for my 3-year old granddaughter when my family came for a visit. It was easy to inflate and stayed fully inflated for days. She was very comfortable on it. The built-in rails were useful for making sure she didn't roll off during the night. The bed was easy to deflate but it must be completely empty to get it back in its storage bag. Overall a really good product!
customer_reviews.author: J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, comfortable bed for our toddler, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Almost-four-year-old has comfortably slept in this when traveling over the last year. Has made our lives a lot easier when on the road. The plastic sides can feel a little cold sometimes, so I have a larger fitted flannel sheet that I wrap around the whole top of it when I make his bed. =) The pump's option to suck all of the air out makes it very easy to break down and store for future use. His grandparents also have this same bed at their house and he sleeps well in it when visiting them.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Good quality travel bed for 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: Great travel bed. Our 2 year old never slept outside of a crib and was getting too big for a pack n play. Was worried he would get out of this at night or fall off but it worked like a charm and he didn't even get out in the morning, He loved it and called it his big boy bed and can't wait to use it again on another trip. During the night I found him laying sideways, but he never fell off it and he seemed to sleep like a champ on it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: kat007

customer_reviews.title: My grandson and his mother like it, but it tears far too easily
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all. It works very well as long as works, but the material it is made of is too thin and tears much too easily. The manufacturer apparently knows this, since it comes with a patch kit, but the patch kit does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Larchmont Resident

customer_reviews.title: Developed hole within the first month
customer_reviews.text: I greatly enjoyed this air mattress at the start, but when it developed a hole near the valve within the first month, it was very disappointing. My daughter (4) said the bed was very comfortable, and she loved it. It was compact and fit her well with plenty of space. The high sides were helpful to keep her from rolling off in the night. Sad that I had to return it due to poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kala

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: This are AWESOME!!! Purchased two for my grand kids and they were perfect! Larger than I expected. I love the fact that they had little rails one both sides to stop them forming rolling out while camping!! Comes with a pump and WOW..simply fast & easy with ease!! HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!! Will fit teens & adults!! No kidding..these are great! ~OCD Grandma :)
customer_reviews.author: S. Kalal

customer_reviews.title: Leaks easily.
customer_reviews.text: Was great for two weeks then it started splitting at the seams. I ran out of the included patches trying to stay ahead of the leaks. The brown center section is not removable and the last leak was on three under side of the mattress. That's when I gave up. Btw, my daughter is only 40 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: jrminton

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing bed!
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing bed!!! This is not only great for travelling but fantastic to have for use at home...sleepovers work a treat with this. Cot sheets fit perfectly over the sleeping area and the fact you can tuck the sheet in is genious. Takes about 10mins to inflate with a foot pump as being in Australia we could not use the electric pump in the box but hey it deflates really quickly so no issues there. We will be using this instead of the portacot when travelling.
customer_reviews.author: Ivana L. Collura

customer_reviews.title: Amazing purchase!! Defiantly worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Really really happy with this purchase. I originally got a cheap “ready bed” that was super disappointment when it arrived so I returned it. Instead I decided to spend the extra money and go for The Shrunks. I’m so glad I did - you really get what you pay for. My three year old nephew has slept on this for the past 2 weeks and we haven’t had to inflate again since first doing it. Deflating it was also super easy. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good blow up mattress
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: JoSchmo

customer_reviews.title: Super Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to use while on vacation as I was tired of hauling the Pack n Play. My daughter slept soundly on it. She did roll off once but not a big deal (Not like she is going to break a bone as it is so close to the ground). I also purchased the travel bag to go with it and keep everything in the bag ready to go (sheets/blankies/night light). I do find it hard to deflate and get back into the brown carry bag. It eventually works but after about 15 min of my cursing it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Guido

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for traveling with toddlers
customer_reviews.text: This is the best investment for traveling we have made. We have taken this bed on international and domestic travel. It gives our toddler "his bed" so he can quickly fall asleep wherever we are staying. It inflates quickly and holds air well. Even after two boys jumping and playing on it. It packs fairly small. I usually fold it which ends up about 12 X 12 X 3. Initially I didn't realize that the air inlets could be popped out for easier filling. This made it a bit more difficult to fill. You have to work at it a bit but if you get the inlets to pop out filling the bed is much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Jeramyn Feucht

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed
customer_reviews.text: We got this bed for sleepovers at Grandma and Grandpa's. She started using it at about 4 and is still using it at 6. Never had a problem with it staying inflated. We put it in the bag after every use. It's not a bed to play on it's for sleeping. Our Grand daughter loves it, well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: For three and a half year old twins, this mattress was perfect. The mom loved the side rolls that kept both on the mattress during their sleep. The mattress itself blew up quickly with enclosed pump and stayed filled wven with a little rough housing. A perfect addition for sleep-overs at home, too.
customer_reviews.author: Now in Texas

customer_reviews.title: From toddler now to big girl!
customer_reviews.text: We used the toddler size and loved it. Now off to the kids size and our almost 4 yo slept like a princess! We use a twin mattress pad, fitted sheet and she sleeps in a sleeping bag on top. Super fast to blow up. Air stayed in for us for a week. Easy to deflate and fold up. Compact and convenient for travel and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & convenient
customer_reviews.text: We got this to replace a very uncomfortable toddler cot we had been using when traveling for a few years now. A friend of mine recommended this travel bed, so we ordered one to try it. We were very pleased. It’s compact, and it’s easy to use. Our kids said it’s comfortable, so we’ll be ordering another so they each have one. We would absolutely recommend this travel bed!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee G.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! My son has insomnia and I (115 lb Mom) have slept on this for weeks to help with relaxation strategies. I sleep soundly all night, despite having preexisting back problems! It has also lasted for years despite people tripping over it, stepping on it, falling on it and roughly moving it around!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: She loved it. It was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure if it would work. We were travelling to WWD and she no longer sleeps or fits in a crib. She loved it. It was easy to assemble. I don't agree with the other reviews that say that the child keeps on falling off of it. My daughter is three and she falls from other beds. But the little protection on the sides seem to keep her from falling off this inflatable bed. It is easy to inflate/deflate and has its own carry bag.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Loved it
customer_reviews.text: Just came back from a long trip and have to give "The Shrunks" travel bed 5 stars, my son slept all night on it without waking up and even napped on it ( he is 3 and really resists naps) It fits on a carry on and the electric pump included with it makes it inflating and deflating the thing a breeze. Over 2 weeks I only had to inflate it a little bit more once. The raised edges are just enough to prevent a small kid to roll out accidentally and the fact that you can actually tuck in your own sheets was great.
customer_reviews.author: Lucia

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter-in-law suggested we purchase the inflatable toddler bed when my grand daughter transitioned from a crib to bed. She feared that the bed in our house was too high off the floor should she slip out at night and she was only 2.5 at the time. What a brilliant purchase. It is the perfect size for her, stores easily when deflated, and uses crib size sheets. We have used it numerous times in our house whenever she sleeps over, taken it on vacation to Mexico and overnight visits to family/friends. My 5 year old grand daughter tried it out, too, and loved it. I would highly recommend the Toddler Inflatable Travel Bed.
customer_reviews.author: Shoe Lover

product_meta.title: The Shrunks Toddler Travel Bed Portable Inflatable Air Mattress Blow Up Bed for Indoor/Outdoor Camping, Backyard, Hotel, or Home Use Kids Floor Bed with Security Bed Rails and Electric Pump
product_meta.description:
Style:ToddlerThe Shrunks Tuckaire Toddler Travel Bed
Designed to offer comfort and safety, Shrunks Tuckaire Toddler Travel Bed makes for a safe night's sleep for kids. The portable bed allows standard crib size sheets and blankets to be tucked neatly into the inner mattress, keeping the sheets off the floor. It's lightweight, folds easily and inflates in just about 5 minutes. Special signature rails protect kids from rolling off. When it comes to sleepovers, camping or just travel, this inflatable bed will be become a part of childhood memories.

Why You'll Love It: Patented Snug fit system allows crib size sheets to be tucked around the mattress.

Age: 24 months and up

Features



Innovative design for comfort and safety
Made from Safe PVC - BpA, lead and phthalate safe
Inflates and deflates rapidly with electric pump
Inflated size: 60 x 37 x 9 (inches), 152 x 94 x 23 (cm)
Approximate deflated size: 16 x 7 x 7 (inches), 40 x 18 x 18 (cm)
Weight: 6.6 lbs, 3 kg
Maximum weight capacity 150 lbs, 68 kg
Won Babbles Award for best toddler travel bed
Includes: Jetaire electric pump
feature_bullets: AIRTIGHT and COMFORTABLE! THE ORIGINAL and AWARD WINNING Toddler Travel Bed: The Shrunks Tuckaire , Signature sheet-tuck feature - fits all standard crib-sized sheets. The Shrunks is the ORIGINAL manufacturer of the Toddler Travel Bed, with numerous design awards and proud to have worked with Amazon for over 10 years.

NO SQUEAKY NOISES - Squeak, squeak, squeak all night long is eliminated, due to the soft flocking on top. THE PERFECT FIT! The Shrunks bed is the right size and the right fit – toddlers need to feel comfortable sleeping in a transition bed that is the right size, so that they feel CONFIDENT and SAFE - a bed designed for them, not for their older brother or sister. *Bigger does not mean better. Adjust the air to customize the bed for each child's comfort.

GUARD RAILS and TUCK FEATURE - Toddlers feel secure, cozy and right at home, thanks to the portable air bed’s unique design – standard sized crib sheets and blankets tuck into the inner air mattress. Our trademarked security rails helps prevent your child from falling and stay in bed - designed low to the ground, for complete safety

INCLUDES - Small and compact, this powerful little pump gets the job done quickly. Approximate inflation time: 30 seconds.; Inflated size: 60 x 37 x 9 (inches), 152 x 94 x 23 (cm) + Includes a convenient carrying bag, repair kit and the compact, yet powerful Jetaire Electric Pump Constructed with the safest materials, The Shrunks Travel Beds are safe from Phthalates, BpA and Lead; Award winning design.

THE ULTIMATE SLEEPOVER - The Toddler Travel Bed is perfect for sleepovers, travel, hotels and for kids transitioning to a big bed. Kids feel secure and cozy, and right at home - thanks to the Shrunks portable air bed’s unique design.

specifications.Additional product features: Blow Up, Inflatable, Air pump, Travel Bag, Tuck-In
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars2,036 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
